title: 12 key moments from the Seahawks’ season
description: The road that Seattle followed back to the Super Bowl featured a few unexpected detours and potholes before leading the Seahawks to the doorstep of NFL history. As the Seahawks attempt  to become the eighth team to win consecutive Super Bowls, here’s a look back at some of the defining moments of the season.

superbowl.title: Game-changing plays of Super Bowl XLIX
superbowl.description: Super Bowl XLIX became an instant classic, with the Patriots rallying from a 10-point deficit in the fourth quarter before the Seahawks drove to the one-yard line … but instead of handing the ball to Marshawn Lynch, they elected to throw. Here are seven pivotal moments in the Patriots’ 28-24 victory.
